about_the_game:
Slimes and Dragons! Continuing in the style and charm of his previous battlers, this third pack of 50 monsters by artist Tyler Warren takes you to the next level. Get ready for a fresh new visual dimension for your professional or amateur project. Similar to Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series monsters, this bundle features a healthy array of “Slime Monsters” and a gorgeous variety of powerful Dragons; a must have for any fantasy adventure game.

Features:

  • 50 unique and beautiful battlers
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
  • All 50 battlers are presented in a range of sizes from large to mini; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues!
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for RPG Maker MV
  • Style used matches Tyler Warren’s other battler packs, similar in spirit to classic RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
  • Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 3rd 50" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 3rd 50" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

 Slimes and Dragons! Continuing in the style and charm of his previous battlers, this third pack of 50 monsters by artist Tyler Warren takes you to the next level. Get ready for a fresh new visual dimension for your professional or amateur project. Similar to Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series monsters, this bundle features a healthy array of “Slime Monsters” and a gorgeous variety of powerful Dragons; a must have for any fantasy adventure game.

Features:

  • 50 unique and beautiful battlers
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
  • All 50 battlers are presented in a range of sizes from large to mini; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues!
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for RPG Maker MV
  • Style used matches Tyler Warren’s other battler packs, similar in spirit to classic RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
  • Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 3rd 50

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Slimes and Dragons! Back a third time with 50 more imaginative and colorful characters in the style of illustrator Tyler Warren!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
